sentences.en: Failing good weather, the match will be held indoors.
sentences.cn: 如果天气不好, 比赛将在室内举行.
要是史密斯不在, 就找汤姆.

sentences.en: For failing to report the accident, his licence was endorsed.
sentences.cn: 由于发生事故未能报告，他的驾驶执照被注明违章。

sentences.en: He had siphoned thousands of pounds a week from the failing business.
sentences.cn: 他一周之内从这家濒临破产的企业里抽走了数千英镑的资金。

sentences.en: He was 58, and his health was failing rapidly.
sentences.cn: 他58岁，身体正在迅速衰老。

sentences.en: He was convicted of failing to muzzle a pit bull.
sentences.cn: 他因没能给比特犬戴嘴套而被判有罪。

sentences.en: He was declared bankrupt after failing to pay a £114m loan guarantee.
sentences.cn: 由于无力偿还1.14亿英镑的贷款担保，他被宣布破产。

sentences.en: Her ambition to become an artist was thwarted by failing eyesight.
sentences.cn: 她想成为艺术家的梦想由于视力衰减而破灭了。

sentences.en: I love him, despite his failings.
sentences.cn: 尽管他有种种缺点，我还是爱他。

sentences.en: In a way, I suppose I'm frightened of failing.
My sight is failing, and I can't see to read any more.
sentences.cn: 我的视力在下降，看不了书了。

sentences.en: She was reprimanded for failing to do her duty.
sentences.cn: 她因失职而遭到了训斥.

sentences.en: They were charged with failing to have professional indemnity cover.
sentences.cn: 他们被指控未能提供职业保险保障。

sentences.en: Water industry chiefs were rapped yesterday for failing their customers.
sentences.cn: 昨天，水利行业的头头们因为怠慢客户而受到批评。

sentences.en: Who wants to buy a computer from a failing company?
sentences.cn: 谁愿意从一家要倒闭的公司买计算机呢？

words.tran_cn: 失败，不成功（fail的过去式和过去分词）
失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退
不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃

trans.tran_cn: 如果（某事）不发生，如果没有（某事物），如果（某人不在），如果没有（某人）
trans.tran_en: used to say that if your first suggestion is not successful or possible, there is another possibility that you could try

trans.tran_cn: 在…中失败( fail的现在分词)，衰退，不及格(fail的ing形式)，破产
